column3: You'll need tokens\xe2\x94\x80beggin' your pardon, \x02\x1a\x02\x02\x03Rowena's\x02\x1a\x02\x01\x03 tokens\xe2\x94\x80to purchase these items. No other forms of payment will be accepted.
The tokens you'll need are issued in exchange for red and blue scrips. Our representatives here can assist you now, if you like.
Of course, if you're short on scrips, you'll have to bring us more collectables...
